divs: Sighting DetailsChris and I were driving south down BeBout Rd, when we spotted it directly southeast in the sky, it was huge, bright and stationary. The sky was clear. Not a cloud. At first we thought it was a planet, but it was really bright. It seemed to change shapes as if rotating. It stayed in view as we turned East, it seemed to go behind us, then when we went North onto Library Road it moved. The object grew bigger until it was an inch big , it created a huge bright halo of light behind it. I commented that it looked like an angel in the shy, one of those you see on a Christmas Tree. It was still there when I pulled in my home, but was gone when I went to the third floor to see it.
Summary: It looked like two small objects together, on top of each other small triangle then big
